textAfterTable: 11 Songs Biography Born: 22 May 1957 in Toledo, OH Genre: Inspirational Years Active: '80s, '90s, '00s, '10s Singer/songwriter Shirley Murdock is best known for the ethereal ballad "As We Lay," which was produced by Roger Troutman. Murdock started out singing gospel music in her native Toledo. Troutman hired her as a background singer for his family's group Zapp, who had several hits on Warner Brothers (or its Reprise imprint).
